LanguageData.ShardSentry.label: shard sentry
LanguageData.ShardSentry.description: Sentry gun with a shard cannon. High fire rate and low fire power, this turret explodes when destroyed. Can be redeployed.
LanguageData.WaveEmitter.label: wave emitter
LanguageData.WaveEmitter.description: Powerful fixed microwave emitter. Ultimate crowd control weapon. This turret explodes when destroyed. Can be redeployed.
LanguageData.NestHMG.label: HMG Nest
LanguageData.NestHMG.description: Fixed gun nest with a mounted heavy machine gun. Simple but effective defense building.
LanguageData.NestAGS.label: AGS Nest
LanguageData.NestAGS.description: Fixed gun nest with a mounted automatic grenade launcher. Greatly effective against massed enemies.
LanguageData.NestMMG.label: MMG Nest
LanguageData.NestMMG.description: Fixed medium machine gun on a tripod. Simple but effective defense building. Can be redeployed.
LanguageData.MoltenCannon.label: molten cannon
LanguageData.MoltenCannon.description: Reliably Propelling a molten metal projectile, Molten cannon is the main anti heavy Mechanoid weapon of Jotunheim Prime.
LanguageData.BarrageCannon.label: barrage cannon
LanguageData.BarrageCannon.description: Designed for long range fire support, the barrage cannon shoots destructive rocket salvo
